snippet.textDisplay: Stop farming and eating animals and welcoming these diseases for a start. So sad to see the dogs etc in the cages, knowing their horrific fate. We're evolving away from the need to eat animals, for many good reasons.
snippet.textOriginal: Stop farming and eating animals and welcoming these diseases for a start. So sad to see the dogs etc in the cages, knowing their horrific fate. We're evolving away from the need to eat animals, for many good reasons.

snippet.textDisplay:
Saria Winchester 
‘Plant based’
Based.
Aka around plants.
Not souly on plants.

Yeah... because milking a cow= a calf can’t drink.
Cows need to be milked anyway even if they have NO CALFS.

Oh... I get it; you’ve seen those vegan videos of them going to literally any country besides countries with the HUMANE SLAUGHTER ACT :) must have read the poster at one of those vegans screaming at people who are having munch at McDonald’s because the vegans don’t have a job.

Knowledge is power... and yet you never break up a sentence and don’t know how cows work.

Also... aren’t cow farmers being targeted by carbon taxes because of 18%... meanwhile 100 companies are responsible for 70+% of the carbon pollutants?

Again; better sources and I DARE you to go to starving African children and say ‘why not eat a cow’ or any of those isolated communities.


Also funny that you ignore everything about pets and animals :) while you show your ignorance about cows... ;) thanks for that quick blip of your self awareness at the end.
You may still be saved yet.

Also isn’t Africa where Zimbabwe happened; where they evolved the killer bees because they destroy the hives instead of harvest them safely... you know; like other farmers do?
And what they are doing in South Africa.

May I also mention the cannibal tribes; albino sanctuary and the fetish market of Africa?

Also... again ignoring the higher amount of sick vegan kids and a babies death being directly linked to a vegan diet :)

Also the 5 year life span of a vegan diet.

‘Living and working until 100+’
Yeah I need evidence for that claim.
There is one guy who claimed not to have eaten in 7 years or decades... and you may want to hear about ‘General buttnaked’ when you talk about Africa, then eating albinos to the extent the albino sanctuary is needed and worse still.
Wouldn’t take their word for it.

snippet.textDisplay: @Silent_Stalker You say we need meat but it's interesting that there's communities of people eating plant based diets on islands such as Sardinia, Ikaria and Okinawa and they're the longest living people on earth, where living and working until they're 100+ is common. I understand some poor countries like Africa etc rely on cows milk for calories but they still allow the calf to drink what it needs and sure as hell don't have cruel factory farms and practices or treat those animals like they do the animals in factory farms where the majority of the meat you eat is produced. Also there is nothing in meat that you can't get from plants, they actually provide a healthier source of nutrients aswell as being better for the planet. And just so you know, most cows are supplemented with b12 via an injection so your meat is still being supplemented, and over half of the population is deficient in b12, its not a vegan thing so don't be afraid of supplements. You're ignorance is not always bliss, but knowledge is always power.
